title: Problem 2141_B
statement: Alice and Bob are planning to play an online game together but haven't decided on which one yet. Alice has a list of n games she enjoys: a_1, a_2, ..., a_n. Bob, on the other hand, has a list of m games he likes: b_1, b_2, ..., b_m. They share at least one game in common between their lists.To choose a game, they take turns suggesting games from their lists. Alice begins by suggesting one of her favorite games. If Bob likes it, they play that game. If not, Bob suggests one of his favorite games.
